32.brief: Anathoth, the name of two Israelites, also of a place in Pal
Ananjah, the name of an Israelite and of a place in Palestine

33.brief: Chatsor, the name (thus simply) of two places in Palestine and of one in Arabia
Ramah, the name of four places in Palestine

35.brief: a gorge (from its lofty sides; hence, narrow, but not a gully or winter-torrent)

36.brief: properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
a Levite or descendant of Levi
a section (of Levites, people or soldiers)
Jehudah (or Judah), the name of five Israelites; also of the tribe descended from the first, and of its territory
Binjamin, youngest son of Jacob; also the tribe descended from him, and its territory
